---
title: "dark mode - ggiraph"
brand:
  light: ../united-brand.yml
  dark: ../slate-brand.yml
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
library(quarto)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggiraph)

light_theme <- theme_brand_ggplot("../united-brand.yml")
dark_theme <- theme_brand_ggplot("../slate-brand.yml")
```

```{r}
#| renderings: [light, dark]
cars <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt)) +
  geom_point_interactive(aes(colour = factor(cyl), tooltip = rownames(mtcars))) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("darkorange", "purple", "cyan4"))

girafe(ggobj = cars + light_theme)
girafe(ggobj = cars + dark_theme)
```
